title: Rugby Watchface
summary: The first Rugby Watchface is now available!
description: The Rugby Watchface shows the current time and a beautiful rugby ball in true Rugby colors. The watchface also provides a counter of days/hours until the upcoming RWC 2015!Features:• Big rugby ball in the middle of the watchface.• Days / Hours counter until RWC 2015.• Full ambient mode.• Interactive watchface - swap between days and hours counters with a simple tap (for Android Wear 1.3+ devices)Supported Watches: • Works for all Android Wear devices - Round and square.
descriptionHTML:
The Rugby Watchface shows the current time and a beautiful rugby ball in true Rugby colors.
The watchface also provides a counter of days/hours until the upcoming RWC 2015!

Features:
• Big rugby ball in the middle of the watchface.
• Days / Hours counter until RWC 2015.
• Full ambient mode.
• Interactive watchface - swap between days and hours counters with a simple tap (for Android Wear 1.3+ devices)

Supported Watches:
• Works for all Android Wear devices - Round and square.
